WELCOME TO ICY VEINS!

On Icy Veins, you will find news and guides about your favorite Blizzard games:

  • class guides for World of Warcraft reviewed by top players and theorycrafters, as well as guides for transmogrification, events, quest lines, raids, etc.;
  • decks and arena spreadsheets for Hearthstone written by Sottle, as well as beginner guides and walkthroughs for solo adventures;
  • barbarian builds, crusader builds, demon hunter builds, monk builds, witch doctor builds, wizard builds, and crafting/farming guides for Diablo 3 written by Deadset;
  • build guides for warrior, assassin, support, and specialist build guides for Heroes of the Storm written by KendricSwissh, Oxygen, Straften, and Micekrispies;
  • Overwatch guides for offense, heroes, support, and tank heroes, reviewed by top players.
